title: Latvian President agrees with "every single word" of Rubio's Munich speech
summary_full: Geopolitical endorsements don't come any more fulsome than the one handed out by Latvian President Edgars Rinkēvičs on February 14th to American Secretary of State Marco Rubio.
summary_public: Geopolitical endorsements don't come any more fulsome than the one handed out by Latvian President Edgars Rinkēvičs on February 14th to American Secretary of State Marco Rubio.
